title: Download
text: The speed data travels from our test server to your device, measured in bytes per second.

title: Upload
text: The speed data travels from your device to our test server, measured in byes per second.

title: Packet loss
text: When a packet of data becomes lost (does not arrive for two seconds), measured as a percentage of packets lost out of packets sent.

title: Data delay
text: How long it takes a data packet to go from your device to our test server and back to your device. Time shown in milliseconds.

title: Jitter
text: Measures the amount of difference between packet delays, or the stability of your latency. Time shown in milliseconds.

title: YouTube
text: Measures the highest bitrate you can reliably stream of the most popular video in your country.

title: Web browsing
text: Measures how long it takes to fetch the HTML and referenced resources of a popular website.
